conbody.p: What is grass? Is it shaped like a trangle? Could be! Here, we will talk about all different kinds of grass you can have on your lawn, and what you can do with said grass.
Grass is commonly found in suburbs, cities, parks, and forests. Some varients of it are natural while other types taste like plastic (I've tried them).
Contrary to popular belief, grass is not just for cows. Grass is for people too. Should they eat it? Maybe, but even the real organic stuff doesn't taste THAT great.
